note:
Hello! I'm an artist across the Fediverse!
What I use: Artist 12 XP Pen Tablet & Apple iPad 9th Gen
Program: ibisPaintx || Procreate || Krita

I also love to write stories! If you're unaware, I have an Inkitt, AO3, and Wattpad account where I write both fanfiction and original stories! I occasionally post about my stories on here when I feel comfortable and when I'm able! ♡
